verses.verse: <S%H453>Elihu<s%> also <S%H3254>proceeded<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>,
<S%H3803>Allow<s%> me a <S%H2191>little<s%>, and I will <S%H2331>show<s%> you that I have yet to <S%H4405>speak<s%> on <S%H433>God<s%>'s behalf.
I will <S%H5375>fetch<s%> my <S%H1843>knowledge<s%> from <S%H7350>afar<s%>, and will <S%H5414>ascribe<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> to my <S%H6466>Maker<s%>.
For <S%H551>truly<s%> my <S%H4405>words<s%> shall not be <S%H8267>false<s%>: he that is <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in knowledge is with <S%H1844>you<s%>.
<S%H410>Behold<s%>, God is <S%H3524>mighty<s%>, and <S%H3988>despises<s%> not <S%H3524>any<s%>: he is mighty in <S%H3581>strength<s%> and <S%H3820>wisdom<s%>.
He preserves not the <S%H2421>life<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: but <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H4941>right<s%> to the <S%H6041>poor<s%>.

He <S%H1639>withdraws<s%> not his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: but with <S%H4428>kings<s%> are they on the <S%H3678>throne<s%>; <S%H3427>Yes<s%>, he does establish them for <S%H5331>ever<s%>, and they are <S%H1361>exalted<s%>.
And if they be <S%H631>bound<s%> in <S%H2131>fetters<s%>, and be <S%H3920>held<s%> in <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>;
Then he <S%H5046>shows<s%> them their <S%H6467>work<s%>, and their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that they acted <S%H1396>insolently<s%>.
He <S%H1540>opens<s%> also their <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H4148>discipline<s%>, and <S%H559>commanded<s%> that they <S%H7725>return<s%> from <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
If they <S%H8085>obey<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3615>him<s%>, they shall spend their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>prosperity<s%>, and their <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H5273>pleasures<s%>.
But if they <S%H8085>obey<s%> <S%H5674>not<s%>, they shall perish by the <S%H7973>sword<s%>, and they shall <S%H1478>die<s%> without <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>.
But the <S%H2611>hypocrites<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> heap <S%H7760>up<s%> <S%H639>wrath<s%>: they <S%H7768>cry<s%> not when he binds <S%H631>them<s%>.
<S%H5315>They<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H5290>youth<s%>, and their <S%H2416>life<s%> is among the <S%H6945>unclean<s%>.
He <S%H2502>delivers<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> in his <S%H6040>affliction<s%>, and <S%H1540>opens<s%> their <S%H241>ears<s%> in <S%H3906>oppression<s%>.

Even so would he have <S%H5496>removed<s%> you out of the <S%H6310>narrow<s%> into a broad <S%H7338>place<s%>, <S%H8478>where<s%> there is no <S%H4164>restriction<s%>; and that which should be <S%H5183>set<s%> on your <S%H7979>table<s%> should be <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1880>fatness<s%>.
But you have <S%H4390>fulfilled<s%> the <S%H1779>judgment<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: <S%H1779>judgment<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> take hold on <S%H8551>you<s%>.
Because there is <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, beware lest he take you <S%H5496>away<s%> with his <S%H5607>stroke<s%>: then a <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H3724>ransom<s%> cannot deliver <S%H5186>you<s%>.
Will he <S%H6186>esteem<s%> your <S%H7769>riches<s%>? <S%H1222>no<s%>, not gold, nor all the <S%H3981>forces<s%> of <S%H3581>strength<s%>.
<S%H7602>Desire<s%> not the <S%H3915>night<s%>, when <S%H5971>people<s%> are cut off in their <S%H5927>place<s%>.
Take <S%H8104>care<s%>, <S%H6437>regard<s%> not <S%H205>iniquity<s%>: for this have you <S%H977>chosen<s%> rather than <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
<S%H410>Behold<s%>, God <S%H7682>exalts<s%> by his <S%H3581>power<s%>: who teaches like <S%H3384>him<s%>?
Who has <S%H6485>enjoined<s%> him his <S%H1870>way<s%>? or who can <S%H559>say<s%>, You have <S%H6466>done<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>?
<S%H2142>Remember<s%> that you <S%H7679>magnify<s%> his <S%H6467>work<s%>, which <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7891>behold<s%>.
Every <S%H120>man<s%> may <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H582>it<s%>; man may <S%H5027>behold<s%> it afar <S%H7350>off<s%>.
<S%H410>Behold<s%>, God is <S%H7689>great<s%>, and we <S%H3045>know<s%> him <S%H4557>not<s%>, neither can the number of his <S%H8141>years<s%> be searched <S%H2714>out<s%>.
For he makes <S%H1639>small<s%> the <S%H5198>drops<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: they pour <S%H2212>down<s%> <S%H4306>rain<s%> according to the vapor <S%H108>there<s%>:
Which the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> do <S%H5140>drop<s%> and <S%H7491>pour<s%> upon <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly<s%>.
Also can any <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H4666>spreadings<s%> of the <S%H5645>clouds<s%>, or the <S%H8663>noise<s%> of his <S%H5521>tabernacle<s%>?
<S%H6566>Behold<s%>, he spreads his <S%H216>light<s%> upon <S%H3680>it<s%>, and covers the <S%H8328>bottom<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.
For by them <S%H1777>judges<s%> he the <S%H5971>people<s%>; he <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H400>food<s%> in <S%H4342>abundance<s%>.
With <S%H3709>clouds<s%> he <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%>; and <S%H6680>commanded<s%> it not to shine by the cloud that comes <S%H6293>between<s%>.
The <S%H7452>noise<s%> there <S%H5046>showed<s%> concerning <S%H4735>it<s%>, the cattle also concerning the <S%H5927>vapor<s%>.
